participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Introverted and imaginative, often lost in thoughts and prefers the comfort of virtual worlds.
participant_1.background: i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it. i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i faint at the sight of blood. my dream in life is to work from home.

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and passionate, with a love for music and a drive to connect with others through her art.
participant_2.background: i also work as a custodian to help pay the bills. i play the piano and guitar and sing. my favorite type of music to sing is folk music. i'm a musician and hope to make it big some day.
